name: Gary's Death Chamber
description:
*epilepsy warning, this game contains a lot of bright and pulsing lights.*

A wave based first person shooter with randomised modifiers, survive as long as you can in a bullet hell arena. At the end of each wave the game is given a modifier to help or hinder your abilities.

This game was originally for the 'not going to GDC' jam, I didn't finish it in time so I fixed it up and put it here.

Thanks for checking out my game. OUO
